	#include<iostream>
	#include<algorithm>
	using namespace std;
	long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
	{
		if(a<b)
			swap(a,b);
		if(b==0)
			return a;
		else
			return gcd(b,a%b);
	}
	int uniqueprime(long long int a,long long int b)
	{
		if(b==1)
			return 0;
		long long int d=gcd(a,b);
		if(d==1)
			return 1;
		else 
			return uniqueprime(a,b/d);
	}
	int main()
	{
		int t;
		cin>>t;
		while(t>0)
		{
			long long int a,b;
			cin>>a>>b;
			int flag=uniqueprime(a,b);
			if(flag==0)
				cout<<"Yes\n";
			else
				cout<<"No\n";
			t--;
		}	
	}
